item.description:
PURCHASE YOUR TICKET BEFORE FEB 12 AND RECEIVE A FREE TICKET TO SLOCO'S THE MERRY WIDOW ($22 VALUE) SAT MARCH 14 @ 8pm

Dead Man's Cell Phone at TheaterWorks Hartford with he CT Theatre Group

Friday Feb 13 2009 Show starts at 8 pm

The CT Theatre Group will meet at before and after the show starting at 7:30 pm
City Arts on Pearl (inside TheaterWorks)


Look for the CTTheatreGroup.org signs – "Always a Great Night Out"

Enjoy Great Theatre With Your Friends In The CT Theatre Group

TICKETS ARE LIMITED AND WILL SELL OUT FAST, SO GET YOURS TODAY!

DEAD MAN’S CELL PHONE

By Sarah Ruhl Directed by Rob Ruggiero

A woman in a café finds that the man with the ringing cellphone next to her is “out of minutes,” so to speak. When Jean answers his phone, she gets swept up into the complicated personal life of the late owner. Reveling in the intrigue and adventure, mousy Jean opens a Pandora’s Box of fantastic twists and fabulous turns in this magical comedy.

“One of those very useful theatrical wake-up calls that most of the things we get upset about are absurd wastes of our limited time.” – Chicago Tribune

Tickets are $47 in the CT Theatre Group section, or 2 tickets for $90

Get your tickets online at http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 436-9449

CLICK HERE to visit the CT Theatre Group and join our email list

See You At The Show!
